---
title: "Best Paper Award at ICSE 2024"
date: "2024-02-28"
description: "Our research on build failure prediction using machine learning receives top recognition at ICSE 2024."
link: "#"
---

Our paper "Predictive Models for Build Failure Detection" has received the Best Paper Award at ICSE 2024. This work presents novel machine learning approaches for early detection of build failures in continuous integration pipelines, potentially saving significant development time and resources.
